venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description:
Connecting With Your Guides Through Journeywork


As a psychic medium, I am often asked by clients how to connect directly to your guides.  Many throughout the ages have achieved this through the Shamanic Journey.  A shamanic journey is a special state of trance consciousness that enables communication with the energy or spirit of the universe.  Through this practice you will discover and communicate with both animal and spirit guides.  In addition to these connections, you will be able to ask questions about yourself and your purpose, helping you to find guidance on your path.  The tools given to you during this three hour workshop will enable you to continue this technique on your own and will assist you on your spiritual growth.  When attending this class, please bring a blanket, water to drink, a pillow, an eye cover and a journal. 
Suggested book to bring with you - Animal Spirit Guides by Steven D. Farmer, PhD.

3 Hour Course - Thurs, May 12th from 6 - 9 PM at KRI, The Center for Consciousness Studies, Greenland, NH
Located in the Gowen’s Corner Plaza on Route 33 in Greenland.
Directions - from I-95, take exit 3 to Route 33 West.  The Center is located 2.6 miles on the right at the corner of 33 and Bayside
Space is limited, pre-registration required, cost - $45 To Register contact Isabeau at 603-973-2317 or send an email to isabeauesby@me.com

 

For more information visit www.IsabeauEsby.com
item.name: SOLD OUT - Journeywork Class - Connect With Your Guides
